attributes.additional_details:
Car Insurance seems to be a big issue for motorist.
Most quotes are generalised due to statistical calculations. This can be unfair to the honest responsible motorists that take extra care on the road,
Car insurance should be made affordable for people. As a consequence the number of uninsured drivers and fraudulent policies are likely to decrease.
A survey was carried out in 2013 with 150 people about car insurance and fraudulent policies. 87% of the people claimed they would take out a fraudulent policy in order to afford the insurance premium and a surprisingly 43% claimed they would drive uninsured because premiums cost too much.
Young drivers are being quoted £10,000 to £15,000 for a car that is not worth a fraction of its price. It is unfair and extortionate. This must stop!
